title: Is Amazon primed for coronavirus?
description:
How the tech giant is responding to the pandemic, and what it says about Amazon as a company.

FEATURING
Jason Del Rey @DelRey

LINKS
Amazon reopened a NYC warehouse a day after a worker tested positive for coronavirus

Amazon is banning its warehouses from stocking nonessential items during the coronavirus pandemic

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:
